#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
        int T;
        cin>>T;
        while (T--) {
                int N, C;
                cin>>N>>C;
                int sum = 0;
                int A;
                for (int i=0;i<N;i++) {
                        cin>>A;
                        sum += A;
                }
                if (C>=sum) cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
                else cout<<"No"<<endl;
        }
        return 0;
}
